dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT j.job_xid bill_lading, j.attribute1 draft_bank_name FROM job j WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID

TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.IB_ADD1','XXX','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.IB_ADD2','XXX','2')) issue_bank_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.IB_CITY','XXX',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.IB_PRVNC','XXX') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.IB_ZIP','XXX') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.IB_CNTRY','XXX')) issue_bank_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.IB_PHONE','XXX') issue_bank_phone, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fax(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.IB_FAX','XXX') issue_bank_fax, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.CB_NAME','XXX') bank_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.CB_ADD1','XXX','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.CB_ADD2','XXX','2')) bank_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.CB_CITY','XXX',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.CB_PRVNC','XXX') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.CB_ZIP','XXX') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.CB_CNTRY','XXX')) bank_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.CB_PHONE','XXX') bank_phone, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fax(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.CB_FAX','XXX') bank_fax, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMonth DD, YYYY') system_date, sref1.shipment_refnum_value letter_of_credit, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.IB_NAME','XXX') issuing_bank, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'dd-mm-rr'), 'MM/DD/YY') draft_date, TRIM(TO_CHAR(s.attribute_currency1,'999,999,990.00')) total_amount, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.DRW_NAME','XXX') drawee_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.DRW_ADD1','XXX','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.DRW_ADD2','XXX','2')) drawee_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.DRW_CITY','XXX',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.DRW_PRVNC','XXX') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.DRW_ZIP','XXX') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.DRW_PHONE','XXX') drawee_phone, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fax(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.DRW_FAX','XXX') drawee_fax, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fullname(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER') ops_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER') ops_phone, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fax(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVO.OPS MANAGER') ops_fax FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.LETTER OF CREDIT' WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID
